name: Fishsticks!
description:
This game is not optimized for browser. It is much better enjoyed when downloaded and played through your desktop.

You, Fishsticks, are on a mission to expose the head of the Mothia; a mob of moths. You must Find Mothew's tax papers to finally land him in jail. Fishticks, however, is no normal fish. He's a fish WITH LEGS. In this fast-paced movement FPS, Fishsticks always comes out on top. 

Press the escape key to access the pause menu, and if you see any glitches, they're not bugs; they're features.

Only the downloadable has cutscenes, but the cutscenes are sick, so make sure to check that out!
